snippet.title: Half-Life 2 Beta: RAISING THE BAR REDUX  | Early Access - Full Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Raising the Bar is a mod based off of the idea of amalgamating the earliest concepts of Half-Life 2 into a coherent story.

Next Part: RTB REDUX Division 1.2 ►►► https://youtu.be/2d8Kw5TVrkA

★★★ Please SUBSCRIBE, LIKE and SHARE! ★★★ Thanks :)

Join us on: 
Discord:► https://half-life.info


You can download Half Life 2: Raising the Bar REDUX: Chapter One for free here: 
https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-2-raising-the-bar-redux

----------------

Half-Life: ALPHA - Gameplay ► https://youtu.be/9vp3XPNKXrE
